# Project: TOON Tools - Comprehensive Token-Oriented Object Notation Toolsuite

## Project Type
Next.js 14+ App Router with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS

## Project Description
A comprehensive web-based toolsuite for TOON (Token-Oriented Object Notation) - the "iLovePDF of TOON tools". This website provides multiple conversion tools, format comparison, token analysis, and educational resources for TOON format. Built to be SEO-optimized, fast, and user-friendly.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- shadcn/ui components
- @toon-format/toon library
- Monaco Editor / CodeMirror for syntax highlighting
- gpt-tokenizer for token counting

## Features
1. JSON ‚Üî TOON Converter
2. CSV ‚Üî TOON Converter
3. YAML ‚Üî TOON Converter
4. XML ‚Üî TOON Converter
5. Format Comparison Playground
6. Token Counter & Analyzer
7. TOON Validator & Formatter
8. Batch Converter
9. API Endpoint Tester
10. Code Generator & Snippets
11. Documentation & Learning Center
12. Blog/Changelog
